notes.message: Debounced the window resize event to try and improve performance.
Fixed numerous situations where matrix fields were turning up blank e.g. element editor HUDs and nested SuperTable Matrix fields.
Fixed a bug where collapsed/dragging blocks weren’t getting their layouts.
Fixed a bug with Redactor fields not initializing properly if hidden when the page loads.
Switched to configuring the global context from the settings page rather than a main cp section.
Don’t show the tab nav if there is only one tab.
Updated the plugin to work with Craft 2.5, which is now required.
Added some default Supercool icons until we get a better one.
Switched to inclusive method of finding which Matrix fields we want to better avoid conflicts.
Fixed an issue with block type field layouts where if you only had one tab nothing would display.
Fixed a bug that meant the configuration pages didn’t work with CSRF protection enabled.
Completely re-worked how groups are defined and stored.
Added block type field layouts.
Added the option to override a given field’s global defaults for a specific context (Entry Types, Category Groups, Global Sets and Users).
Added group headings to the block type settings menu.
Added the loadPimpMyMatrixConfigurator and loadPimpMyMatrixFieldManipulator hooks so plugins can add custom contexts.
When the field gets too narrow the button group is swapped for one button with group headings in the menu. Fixes issue #7.
Fixed a bug that created a conflict with SuperTable.
Allowed the plugin to work everywhere except inside dashboard widgets.
Removed the block headings and other per-block styles due to the Matrix UI improvements made in Craft 2.3.
Fixed a bug where PMM broke when viewing previous versions of an entry.
Fixed a bug where the newly added menu buttons triggered a new, empty matrix block.
Fixed a bug where PMM was getting applied to entries when edited in huds - this really doesn't work, maybe one day it will.
Fixed a bug where all settings forms we're getting hi-jacked thus breaking installing / uninstalling other plugins.
Improved the json generation when using the settings page
Added MIT licence
Fixed an error with php 5.3
Added some limited documentation
Initial release
